intro: In a far realm, where monsters are not just myths, ...
... a young squire set out to find fame and glory.
As a child, the squire had heard stories of the legendary crypt of Anathun, an endless dungeon filled with monsters.
Only few have ever returned from it's depths, but to be knighted, a squire is required to fulfill great deeds.
And so, you find yourself in the dimly lit crypt of Anathun. This is where your story begins.
